Key Match Events: Shohei Ohtani partially dislocated his left shoulder on a slide at second base
Tommy Edman and Teoscar Hern√°ndez also went deep
Giancarlo Stanton's one-out RBI single against Blake Treinen closed the gap to 4-2
Post-Match Reflections: Yoshinobu Yamamoto's performance was his finest start since the injury
Aaron Judge went 0 for 4 with three strikeouts and is struggling in the Series
Miscellaneous Highlights: Yamamoto turned down the Yankees last December and joined the Dodgers for a $325 million, 12-year contract
Others: The game was played at Dodger Stadium
The Dodgers took a 2-0 Series lead
The Yankees are 0-2 for the first time since 2001
